attributes.action: Introduce new “Family migration” for British Citizen to bring first blood in UK
attributes.additional_details:
1. More employees, employers mean more taxes, N.I and Pension to Government. 
2. More income and more expenses.
3. Less pressure on Government to bring skilled workers from outside the country.
4. More family members means less mental health issues mean less pressure on NHS.
attributes.background: To Introduce new and simple Immigration system for British Citizens to bring family members in U.K. from outside.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552130

If you want the rights of family members of British citizens to migrate to the UK to be changed in a way other than requested by the above petition, you could start a new petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear exactly what changes you want to be made to current immigration rules.
